title: Fix for DB locking on Samsung Galaxy tabs.  Now there's only one SQLite helper…
message: Fix for DB locking on Samsung Galaxy tabs.  Now there's only one SQLite helper instance, held by the application.   This should avoid some of the more obvious locking problems.

title: Moved run state into separate object - Service writes to it, activity reads from…
message: Moved run state into separate object - Service writes to it, activity reads from it on broadcast from service.  Better handling of cancellation.  State stored in Application, keyed by 'probeRunId' to prevent older broadcasts from colliding.

Separated DB setup and 'business logic' into Helper and DAOs (although the DAOs are simply subclasses).  This is likely to change with ORM integration.  Standardised on the use of 'Schedule' in naming
